author: elfontan
body:
#### PR description:
This PR is a backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/45086 and it implements the correct treatment of HMT triggers in the code used for the producing test vectors starting from MC data. 
Code used for validation of the firmware vs emulator agremeent in the GT.

#### PR validation:
The PR has been prepared starting from CMSSW_14_0_MULTIARCHS_X_2024-07-15-2300:
```
cmsrel CMSSW_14_0_X_2024-06-30-2300
cd CMSSW_14_0_MULTIARCHS_X_2024-07-15-2300/src
cmsenv
git cms-init
git cms-addpkg L1Trigger/L1TGlobal
scram b && scram b code-checks && scram b code-format && scram b
```

A test vectors based on the latest [L1Menu_Collisions2024_v1_3_0](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cms-l1-dpg/L1MenuRun3/master/development/L1Menu_Collisions2024_v1_3_0/L1Menu_Collisions2024_v1_3_0.xml) and MC data has been successfully produced as follows:
```
cd CMSSW_14_0_MULTIARCHS_X_2024-07-15-2300/src/L1Trigger/L1TGlobal
mkdir -p data/Luminosity/startup
cd data/Luminosity/startup
wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cms-l1-dpg/L1MenuRun3/master/development/L1Menu_Collisions2024_v1_3_0/L1Menu_Collisions2024_v1_3_0.xml
cd -
cp test/runGlobalFakeInputProducer.py .
>> Edit runGlobalFakeInputProducer.py to modify the name of the xml
cmsRun runGlobalFakeInputProducer.py
```
title: Adds muon shower triggers for MC-based test vector production
